altTitles.en: Galactic Patrol Jaco

altTitles.fr: Jaco le patrouilleur de la galaxie

altTitles.ja: 銀河パトロールジャコ

description.en:
Retired scientist Omori lives alone on a deserted island while continuing his research into time-travel. His quiet life in interrupted when galactic patrolman Jaco crash-lands and decides to move in with him. This agent from space claims to be elite, but sometimes it can a little hard to believe. Can Jaco get along with the old man long enough to save the earth from a dangerous threat?  
  
A bonus series, [Dragon Ball Minus](https://mangadex.org/manga/13175), was released with it.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/jaco-the-galactic-patrolman)
The protagonists reality begins to crumble after he is rejected by his love interest…?  A moving psychological horror that blends dreams and reality!
description.ja: 主人公が片思いに振られた後、彼の現実が崩れ始めます…？ 夢と現実を交錯させた、感動的な心理ホラー！

altTitles.en: Friends Games

altTitles.ja: トモダチゲーム

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon
Skeleton Soldier

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.en: Loner Life in Another World

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.en: My Ordinary Life

altTitles.ja: 日常

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

title.en: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life - Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru

altTitles.ja: 異世界召喚おじさんの銃無双ライフ 〜サバゲー好きサラリーマンは会社終わりに異世界へ直帰する〜

altTitles.ru: Призванный в потусторонний мир дядя - живёт оружейным воином

altTitles.en: The Gunner's Life of a Middle-aged Man Summoned to Another World and Armed with a Rifle: An Airsoft Addicted Salaryman Returns to the Alternative World After Work

altTitles.id: Om-Om Pegawai Kantoran Pecinta Airsoft Pergi Ke Dunia Lain

description.en: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
description.id: Seorang om-om yang hobi bermain airsoft bernama koga daisuke telah terpanggil ke dunai lain pada ulang tahunnya yang ke-40. Dianugerahi sebuah kekuatan untuk mengubah senjata airsoft menjadi senjata asli, daisuke harus bisa menyelamatkan dunia tersebut selagi bolak-balik dari dunia lain ke dunia nyata. bersama dengan seorang ksatria bernama lena, daisuke menjadi satu-satunya pengguna senapan yang akan mendominasi dunia lain tersebut sepulang kerja!

altTitles.en: Let's Hold Hands!

altTitles.ja: てをつなごうよ

altTitles.zh: 我们牵手吧~你是我的花~

description.en: Kusunoki Azuki and Daizu are close siblings who live in the Arisuno apartment complex. Their next door neighboor is Azuki's childhood friend Tachibana Chika, who has feelings for her. One day, two brothers who are close to their ages, Hiiragi Mizuki and Ryuusei, move into their other neighboring apartment. A heart throbbing neighborhood graffiti starts now!
description.pt-br: Kusunoki Azuki e Daizu são irmãos próximos que moram no complexo de apartamentos Arisuno. O vizinho ao lado é o amigo de infância de Azuki, Tachibana Chika, que tem sentimentos por ela. Um dia, dois irmãos quase da mesma idade, Hiiragi Mizuki e Ryuusei, mudam-se para o outro apartamento vizinho. Um graffiti de bairro pulsante começa agora!

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!

title.en: Love Angel and the Corporate Slave

altTitles.ja: 恋天使と社畜さん

description.en:
Ai-chan aspires to be an angel of love.
In order to study "love", she is taught all sorts of things by a gentleman.

title.en: Cute Baby Arrives: Mommy is Super Fierce

altTitles.zh: 萌宝驾临：爹地妈咪超凶的

altTitles.en: Adorable Baby Arrives: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce
Cute Baby Is Coming: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce

altTitles.zh-hk: Meng Bao Jia Lin: Die Di Ma Mi Chao Xiong De

altTitles.en: The Adorable Treasure Has Arrived: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce

description.en: When the not-so-famous actress Jane wakes up in the morning, her cute-but-nagging son Ian already had her day plan out for her – go on a blind date and find a father for the household. However, her date turns out to be Mark Quinn, the biological father of her son. The sullen business man obviously doesn't have the best impression of Jane and would not have expected that they will enter marriage soon with the help of Mark's father and Ian...

title.en: Shiotaiou no Sato-san ga Ore ni dake Amai

altTitles.ja: 塩対応の佐藤さんが俺にだけ甘い

altTitles.en: Aren’t You Too Sweet Salt-God Sato-San?
The Salt-God Sato-san is only sweet to me!

altTitles.zh: 冷淡的佐藤同學只對我撒嬌

altTitles.th: คุณซาโต้ยอดนักเมิน เธอหวานใส่ผมแค่คนเดียว

description.en:
Satou-san is the unattainable flower of the class. She is always cold and curt with classmates, but only I know she's actually very cute when she smiles, even if she's not much of a photographer.  
  
Oshio-kun is friendly and lively, but only I know he works at his family's cafe after school. He does a great job with the cafe's SNS account, and his mischievous smile makes my heart skip a beat!  
  
Innocent and sweet, but sometimes frustrating, this is a 120%-pure fluffy story about two people falling in love for the first time.
description.ja:
こんなに甘い”両片想い”見たことない！

「佐藤さんは高嶺の花で誰に対しても塩対応。でも、意外と隙だらけだって俺だけが知ってる。写真を撮るのが下手。そのくせドヤ顔しがち。そして、へにゃっと笑う顔がすごく可愛い」

「押尾君は誰に対しても優しい。でも、意外といじわるなところもあるって私だけが知ってる。SNSを使うのが上手。オシャレなカフェの店員さん。そして、悪戯っぽく笑う顔にすごくドキドキする」

――これは内緒だけど、俺（私）はそんな彼女（彼）のことが好きだ。

初々しくて、もどかしい二人の初恋。尊さ＆糖度120％！
description.pt-br:
Satou-san é a flor inatingível da classe.  Ela é sempre fria e ríspida com os colegas de classe, mas só eu sei que ela é realmente muito fofa quando sorri, mesmo que ela não seja muito fotogênica.
  
Oshio-kun é amigável e animado, mas só eu sei que ele trabalha no café de sua família depois da escola.  Ele faz um ótimo trabalho com a conta da internet do café, e seu sorriso malicioso faz meu coração bater mais forte!
  
 Inocente e doce, mas às vezes frustrante, esta é uma história fofa 120% pura sobre duas pessoas se apaixonando pela primeira vez.

altTitles.en: Honey Rabbit!

altTitles.ja: はにらび！

description.en: Fumiko lives together with her parents and her Rabbit. One day, when her parents aren't at home, her Rabbit is gone and instead there is a sweet boy with bunny ears.
description.pt-br: Fumiko vive com os seus pais e o seu coelho. Um dia, quando os seus pais não estão em casa, o seu coelho desaparece, e em seu lugar, está um doce menino com orelhas de coelho.

title.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.ja: 勝利の女神：NIKKE すいーとえんかうんと

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

altTitles.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encount

description.en:
In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!
description.ja: 全世界累計2500万DL突破の大人気アプリゲーム『NIKKE』の公式初まんが。このまんがの世界では、NIKKEたちは平和に過ごす――。主人公Nがココアやソーダがいるメイド喫茶「メイド・フォー・ユー」でメイドとして働くゆるふわコメディ♪

title.en: Cheat Mode Farming in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Yurufuwa Nouka no Mojibake Skill ~Isekai de Catalog Tsuuhan Yattemasu~

altTitles.id: Bertani di Dunia Lain Dengan Mode Cheat

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuru Fuwa Noka No Mojibake Skill

altTitles.pt-br: Agricultura no modo cheat em outro mundo

altTitles.en: Slow-Life Farmer's Random Skills

altTitles.ja: ゆるふわ農家の文字化けスキル ~異世界でカタログ通販やってます~

description.en: Tatsuya, a 29-year-old bachelor, gets accidentally summoned to another world and obtains [Agricultural Skills]. In order to survive, he starts a vegetable garden in a secluded forest. He thought that his life in another world would be extremely difficult, but the ingredients in this other world were delicious and the crops he grew on his own were also very delicious! Furthermore, he's also very happy with the dishes he made with Japanese seasonings! Typical. Rice and sake are going to be a staple apparently, but you guys know the drill. Besides, if there are beautiful brides, isn't it okay if he lives in this other world? Loose and fluffy, a relaxing other world harem life!!
description.pt-br: Um homem solteiro de 29 anos é invocado para outro mundo. recebendo uma habilidade de agricultura level 1. Crie uma casa, faça uma horta e viva uma tranquila vida isolada na floresta. Com bebidas e comidas deliciosas de sua colheita e lindas garotas, não tem coisa melhor.

altTitles.en: Savage Hero

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜英雄

description.en: 10 years since he reincarnated in hell…Takamichi is troubled. With the “Incubus” power unlocking further to become stronger by having sex with women but his growth peaked. “I’ll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!” Sexy & violent pretty girl battle fantasy!
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

altTitles.en: World End Boy Meets Girl

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, 
high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. 
Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. 
He thought he would "just" keep on living like that. Until he met her. 
Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead? 
It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend's Friend

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her ... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this? A fascinating erotic story drawn by Jura from the popular doujin circle "JACK-POT".
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？ 大人気同人サークル「JACK-POT」のじゅらが描く、魅惑の背徳物語。

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

altTitles.en: Prisoners for the Deathrow
Shikeishuu ~The Last Days of Abnormal Criminals~

altTitles.ja: 私刑囚～異常犯罪者の末路～

altTitles.en: Vantablack

description.en: The story is about Mio Shiraki, a woman who feeds on diabolical criminals.

“I never knew a day like this would come where I’d be doing this with you, Sunbae.”

Shim Woojin was Kwon Gyeong’s upperclassman during high school. 

12 years later, they reunite at Woojin’s best friend’s (Inseob’s) wedding, who also turned out to be Gyeong’s first love.

Gyeong, who considered Woojin as his rival in love, and Woojin, who had been fond of Gyeong, find themselves celebrating an after-party by themselves.

As their conversation grows, their night with each other grow too, but…

altTitles.en: Tea Time For Dreaming Maids
Dreaming Maid's Tea Time

altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

title.en: An Incompetent Woman Wants to Be a Villainess: The Young Lady Who Married as a Substitute for Her Half-Sister Didn't Notice the Duke's Doting

altTitles.ja: 無能才女は悪女になりたい ～義妹の身代わりで嫁いだ令嬢、公爵様の溺愛に気づかない～

altTitles.en: An Incompetent Woman Wants to Be a Villainess: The Young Lady Who Married as a Substitute for Her Stepsister Didn't Notice the Duke's Doting

altTitles.ja-ro: Munou Saijo wa Akujo ni Naritai ~Gimai no Migawari de Totsuida Reijou, Koushaku-sama no Dekiai ni Kizukanai~

description.en:
Avril is a young woman of exceptional ability who was mistreated and labeled "incompetent" by her family. 

Avril marries into the family of an "old, lustful duke" in place of her half-sister, but the duke, Dylan, is actually a beautiful young man who is the complete opposite of what he is rumored to be. He wants to marry a "villainess," and a contractual divorce after three years is perfect for Avril's future freedom. 

The people around her are bewildered by the mysterious "brilliant woman" who plays the role of a "villainess" with gusto, but they are gradually drawn to her...
description.ja:
“悪女”として嫁ぐことになりました

“悪女”と名高い義妹の身代わりで、『好色家の老いぼれ公爵様』のもとへ嫁がされることになったエイヴリル。しかし、そこで待っていたディランは噂とは真逆の美しい青年だった。

彼が提示した「三年後に離縁する契約結婚」は自由を求めるエイヴリルにとって絶好の条件。二つ返事で了承し、マイペースに悪女を演じる不思議な才女に、周囲の見る目は次第に変わっていき――!?

title.en: The Mad King(Prequel to the Journey to the West)

description.en: Under the vast universe governed by the Dragon God, this is the independent story of the Asura clan, focusing on the rise of the Asura King, Lord Kuar, who dominates the three realms. As a naturally fragile Asura youth, Yu, with the tragic loss of his family to mysterious Asura forces, finds himself forcibly taken away and subjected to hellish trials. Through countless cycles of death and rebirth, Yu undergoes a transformation, ultimately shouldering the belief of his dearest friend to become the Asura King—Kuar, renamed Lord Hou. This sparks a century-long war between the heavens and the Asuras, with the emergence of the new youth.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.en: I'm Only a Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Just So Cute!
I'm a Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Just Too Cute!
I'm the Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Too Cute

altTitles.es: Solo soy una madrastra pero mi hija es tan linda

altTitles.uk: Я тільки мачуха, але моя дочка така мила!

altTitles.ru: Я всего лишь мачеха, но моя дочь - просто прелесть!
Я мачеха, но моя дочь слишком милая

altTitles.th: ฉันเป็นแม่เลี้ยงนะ แต่ลูกสาวน่ารักเกินไปแล้ว

altTitles.ja: 継母だけど娘が可愛すぎる

altTitles.zh: 我是继母，但是女儿太可爱了

altTitles.id: Aku seorang ibu tiri, namun anakku sangat imut

description.de:
Sie lebt für ihren Beruf und arbeitet zu viel — bis sie an Überarbeitung zusammenbricht und stirbt. Doch statt ihre Augen für immer zu schliessen, erwacht sie in einer Märchenwelt. Sie steckt im Körper der bösen Stiefmutter! Aber wie kann sie nur das Vertrauen ihrer Stieftochter aewinnen?

Spieglein, Spieglein an der Wand, wer ist die netteste Stiefmutter im ganzen Land?

---

description.en:
Fairytale stepmothers are notoriously wicked. But after a children’s clothing designer is reborn as young Princess Blanche’s stepmom, she’s determined to break the mold and shower her daughter with love. Now she just has to convince the girl’s cold-hearted father to do the same. In her quest to make a happier home for Blanche, Abigail begins to uncover secrets and schemes within the palace. Will devious forces tear the Freidkins apart, or can Abigail stitch them back into a family?

---

description.fr:
J'ai été transmigrée en le parfait cliché de la belle-mère jalouse et cruelle! Une mauvaise femme qui a énormément fait souffrir l'adorable Blanche, finissant même par l'empoisonner. Heureusement, le destin se retourne contre elle et la belle-mère finit exécutée par son mari.

Ma petite Blanche est tellement mignonne, je veux la couvrir d'affection et de tous les cadeaux possibles.

Sauf que pendant ce temps là, mon mari pense qu'il s'agit d'un nouveau stratagème pour attirer son attention, mais la seule que je veux, c'est ma belle-fille!

---
Réincarnée en la méchante belle mère de Blanche neige, je ferai tout pour gagné l'amour de cette enfante. Cependant, un obstacle de taille ce dressera sur ma route.

«Je suis aussi le parent de Blanche, j'exige des excuses pour m'avoir tellement méfié.»

«Et si je ne le fait pas?»

«Je viendrais visiter votre chambre ce soir, majesté.»

«...»

«J'ai même réussi a obtenir des culottes vraiment sexy juste pour vous~»

---

description.zh:
我穿越成了白雪公主的恶毒继母？！但是前世的我其实是一个非常喜欢小孩子的儿童服装设计师。明明面对可爱的女儿喜不自禁，但是不论怎么努力，都得不到女儿和丈夫的信任。丈夫觉得我态度大转变，定有阴谋。我到底如何才能在这个充满怀疑的新世界成功的活下去…？

---

Eu me vi dentro de uma história como a madrasta ciumenta de sua filha que tentou matar com uma maçã envenenada. Eu amaria se pudesse ter a confiança da minha fofa e amável Blanche. Mas- "Hilário, Desde quando você gosta tanto da Blanche?" Esse marido continua em meu caminho!

altTitles.ja: 星の謳歌
ほしうた

altTitles.en: HoshiUta

description.en:
A new coming-of-age series from from Liberum, whom you might know for Soushi Souai.

Friends, lovers, fashion and hanging out after-school...
For Hoshino Ouka, a gal who grew up in the city those are important things. But when she unexpectedly had to move to the country side town 'Yutakamachi', everything she hold dear vanishes...? In an unfamiliar town the fresh and tender days of youth begin!

altTitles.ja: ウィッチ ウォッチ

description.en: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.
description.ne:
निको वाकात्सुकीले आफ्नो छ वर्षको बोक्सीको तालिम पूरा गरिसकेकी छिन् र उनी आफैं सहरमा सर्दैछिन्। नयाँ बोक्सीको रूपमा, उसले आफ्नो साथ दिनको लागि परिचित छनोट गर्नुपर्छ। यद्यपि, अन्य बोक्सीहरू भन्दा फरक, उनी गैर-जन्तु परिचित छान्न चाहन्छिन्। मोरिहितो "मोई" ओतोगी भन्दा राम्रो साथी कोही छैन - उनको बाल्यकालको साथी जो एक औघ राक्षस हुन्। मोरिहितो उनको नोकर हुनुको कडा विरोध गर्छन्, तर उनले बोक्सीको आदेशको अवज्ञा गरेमा श्रापले उनलाई अनौठो गाई-बाघ हाइब्रिडमा फर्काउनेछ भनेर थाहा पाएपछि उनले आफ्नो भाग्यलाई अनिच्छुकतासाथ स्वीकार गर्छन्।

मोरिहितोका बुबा व्यवसायिक यात्राको लागि जानुभएको कारण र निकोकी आमा बोक्शीहरुको पवित्र भूमिमा पछाडि रहनुभएको कारण, दुई किशोरहरूले आफूलाई एउटै छानामुनि सँगै बसेको भेट्टाए। जबकि निको आफ्नो क्रशसँग बाँच्न पाउँदा उत्साहित छिन्, मोरिहितोले पत्ता लगाए कि उनको जादुई गतिविधि र समग्र अनाड़ीपनले समाधान भन्दा बढी समस्याहरू सिर्जना गर्छ। एक वर्ष भित्र निकोमा आउने भविष्यवाणी गरिएको प्रकोपको साथ, मोरिहितोले आफ्नो अंगरक्षकको रूपमा रक्षा गर्नको लागि सक्दो गर्नुपर्दछ र साथै आफ्नो परिचितको रूपमा आफ्नो कर्तव्यहरू पालना गर्नुपर्नेछ।
description.pt: Morihito, um menino com a força de um ogro, está prestes a começar a viver com sua amiga de infância, Niko, que está treinando para ser feiticeira. A magia de Niko os leva a todos os tipos de problemas imprevisíveis, e com dois adolescentes sob o mesmo teto… Que as travessuras fantásticas comecem! Uma série de comédia de magia de Kenta Shinohara, criador de SKET DANCE e Astra Perdido no Espaço.
description.ru:
Морихито, парень с демонической силой, начинает жить вместе со своей подругой детства Нико, которая учится быть ведьмой. Магия Нико приводит ко всяким непредсказуемым проблемам, а уж когда два подростка остаются под одной крышей… да начнутся фантастические выходки!  
Магический комедийный сериал от Кенты Синохары, автора «SKET DANCE» и «Астра, затерянная в космосе».
description.uk:
Моріхіто, хлопець з силою оні, ось-ось почне жити разом зі своєю подругою дитинства Ніко, яка навчається на відьму. Магія Ніко призводить до всіляких непередбачуваних неприємностей, а коли двоє підлітків живуть під одним дахом... Фантастичні витівки починаються!
Магічний комедійний серіал від Кента Шінохари, творця “SKET DANCE” та "Загублена в космосі Астра".

altTitles.ja: ニックとレバー

altTitles.en: Nick and Lever

description.en:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!

altTitles.ja: 愛囚ラヴァ

altTitles.en: Aishuu Lover

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

altTitles.en: Wondercat Kyuu-chan

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
The cute Kyuu-chan is a wonder cat. Dance, sing, be happy together!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.en: Spinach Flowers

description.en:
Ji-woo transfers to a rural school with his parents who have returned to farming. The fresh air, the relaxed atmosphere... he liked them all. However, for a moment that seemed like a pleasant start,

Ji-woo discovers that the flower garden that he has carefully cared for has been messed up.. Ji-woo, who thought it was someone's territoriality, suspects Dongchan, who was particularly harsh to him at school.
First off, that bangs! I'll start with those bangs that make it impossible to know what you're thinking!!
description.fr: La vie à la campagne est censée être idyllique, non ? Un endroit paisible rempli d'aimables voisins au grand cœur, pas vrai ? C'est ce que Jiwoo attend avec impatience... Mais de tous les voisins qu'il aurait pu avoir, c'est Dongchan qu'il est le sien. Froid, distant et insondable, Dongchan n'est pas le plus accueillant du voisinage. En fait, on dirait qu'il n’a pas du tout envie que Jiwoo et sa famille s’installent ici. Déconcerté mais pas découragé, Jiwoo fait de son mieux pour s'adapter à la vie à la campagne... jusqu'à ce qu'il s'avère que quelqu'un essaie de chasser sa famille d'ici. Jiwoo a des soupçons, mais sera-t-il capable de trouver le vrai coupable ?
description.ko:
귀농한 부모님을 따라 시골 학교로 전학 온 지우. 상쾌한 공기, 여유로운 분위기.. 모두 마음에 들었다. 그러나 기분 좋게 새출발 할 수 있을 것 같았던 것도 잠시,
지우네가 정성껏 가꾼 꽃밭이 엉망이 된 걸 발견하는데..
누군가의 텃세일 거라 생각한 지우는 학교에서 자신에게 유독 까칠했던 동찬을 의심한다.
일단 저 앞머리! 무슨 생각 하는지 알 수 없게 하는 저 앞머리부터 까고 만다!!

altTitles.ja: カーストロマンス

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

altTitles.ja: ロマンティック・ダーク

description.en: Neo, who is about to make his major debut in the band, gets constantly injured. A traffic accident that happened for three days in a row, a mysterious high fever and him constanly falling down the stairs... The manager ordered me to remove the curse, and the one I was heading towards was a pretty girl- "Yoyo". "I'll help you find the mystery of your destiny", the girl spoke, while stepping into my life. A bandman with a mysterious attraction, musician x a spirit, who only seeks to find the mystery of fate. The most terrifying mix of love and horror!?? The duo's occultic love has begun!

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai
My Senpai Is Annoying

Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.en: Fly Me to The Moon
TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

altTitles.en: Cute Anyways

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: 100 Ghost Stories to Die For
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en: Anthology horror series detailing the "Round of 100 Ghost Stories", an old folktale believed to originate from Japan retold through the lens of Yuuma, a boy who lives in a troubled household. Often used as a test of courage where participants tell one hundred supernatural stories and blow out one candle then look at themselves in the mirror after they finish each story. When the one-hundredth candle is blown out, it is said that ghosts and demons are summoned to our world.
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: 渚、それが君の愛ならば

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

title.en: Senpai no Kanojo ga Motokano Datta

altTitles.ja: 先輩の彼女が元カノだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai no Kanojo ga Moto Kano Datta

altTitles.en: Senpai's Girlfriend Is My Ex

description.es-la: ¡¡La chica que mi senpai trajo a la mesa para beber es la misma chica con la que solía salir!! Ahora que ambos somos adultos, ¡tengo la sensación de que una reunión inesperada será algo inapropiado!

altTitles.ja: GIGANTIS―ジャイガンティス―

description.en:
On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

altTitles.ja: アデカン

description.en: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!

altTitles.en: Ghost Blade

description.en:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
description.fr:
Il y a fort longtemps au royaume de Nera, les fidèles humains érigèrent une tour en signe de leur respect pour leur déesse Nera.  
La déesse Nera, profondément touchée par la foi de ces derniers, ouvrit une porte au sommet de la tour pour les récompenser. Cette porte mystique était connectée à un autre monde. Elle fut dénommée *l'Œil céleste*.  
Mais un jour…
description.uk:
Давним-давно в Нераланді благочестиві люди побудували велику вежу, в знак поваги до своєї богині Нери.   
Богиня Нера була глибоко зворушена людським благочестям; щоб нагородити їх, вона відчинила двері на верхівці вежі. Ці ефірні двері пов'язані з іншим світом; І були відомі як *Райське Око*.  
Однак…  


---
description.zh: 很久以前，诺拉大陆的人类为了表示对诺拉女神最崇高的敬意，筑起了一座宏伟的高塔。 女神为人们的虔诚所动， 在高塔的顶端打开了一扇通往异世的大门。 来自另一个世界的羽族人为人类带来了文明与进步，但最终两族人在各种矛盾下刀戈相向。 战后数百年过去了，大陆再一次笼罩在不安与诡异的阴云中...
description.pt-br:
Há muito, muito tempo atrás em Neraland, o piedoso humano construiu uma grande torre para mostrar o respeito à sua deusa Nera.

Deusa Nera ficou comovida pela piedade humana; para recompensá-los, ela abriu uma porta no topo da torre. Esta porta etérea conectada a outro mundo; era conhecida como "Olho do Paraíso". 

 Contudo...

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!

description.en:
Two female leads hidden away in a vast estate, who save each other through their roller coaster of a relationship!
Bai Yuetao, wife of a rich businessman, blames herself for her husband's skirt-chasing tendencies. After spending another night alone in their lavish residence, she sees a graceful woman appear in the newly bought western mirror. This woman calls herself "Butterfly Dream" and says that she can teach Bai Yuetao how to "hook" her husband's heart. But the price she demands?
Bai Yuetao's body.

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia
Mairimashita! Iruma-kun Mafia AU

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...

title.en: Dragon Ball Super - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール超
ドラゴンボール超 カラー版

description.ar: يتّبع دراغون بول سوبر آثار معركة غوكو الشرسة مع ماجين بوو وهو يحاول الحفاظ على سلام الأرض الهش.
description.en:
Dragon Ball Super follows the aftermath of Goku's fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth's fragile peace.

Having defeated Majin Buu, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment.

After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
